price: (Warra) gandaa tokkollee hin balleessine beellamni beekamaan isheef jiraatu malee .
arabic: وَمَآ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مِن قَرۡيَةٍ إِلَّا وَلَهَا كِتَابٞ مَّعۡلُومٞ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wamā ahlaknā min qaryatin illā walahā kitābun maʿlūmun
